original_text: “You shall also make a basin of bronze, with its stand of bronze, for washing. You shall put it between the tent of meeting and the altar, and you shall put water in it,
korean_text: 너는 물두멍을 놋으로 만들고 그 받침도 놋으로 만들어 씻게 하되 그것을 회막과 제단 사이에 두고 그 속에 물을 담으라

sentences.original_text: You shall also make a basin of bronze,
You shall put it between the tent of meeting and the altar,
sentences.korean_translation: 너는 그것을 회막과 단 사이에 두고,

sentences.original_text: and you shall put water in it,
